titleStmt.title: The Figure of three, or, A Patterne of good counsell gathered for the delight of the well disposed.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.B. and are to be sold in S. Laurence lane at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: pages cropped and stained with print show-through and tightly bound with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: S. Laurence lane at the signe of the Bible
